ack.p: We gratefully thank Prof. Yong Zhao of the Institute of Zoology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, for the IL-17A knock-out mice, Prof. Jilong Chen, Dr. Jun Wu, and Dr. Xuefeng Duan of the Institute of Microbiology, Chinese Academy of Sciences for helpful suggestions, and Ms. Xi Liang and Ms. Weihua Zhuang of the Institute of Microbiology, Chinese Academy of Sciences for technical support.
